subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Melky Cabrera was suspended for 50 games, Gregor Blanco has had the chance to fill his mentor’s shoes on the Giants lineup, batting .281 in 42 regular season games during Cabrera’s absence.
snippet: After Melky Cabrera was suspended for 50 games, Gregor Blanco has had the chance to fill his mentor’s shoes on the Giants lineup, batting .281 in 42 regular season games during Cabrera’s absence.
